TopicTitle: Mechanics for Kerbal to die when being close to or touching certain surface

Articles.Content:
I'm building crusher models so I would like to add possibility for Kerbal to die if he does maintenance incorrectly (be close to dangerous surface / face without switching off machinery first).

Is it possible?

overheat the root part if it intersects with a trigger-collider..

onTriggerStay is your friend..
